root.name: : (Colon)

example.code:
def setup(): # A colon declares the start of an indented block. size(150, 150)
# Any statements followed by indendent lines should end with a colon. def draw(): # Here for i in range(5): # And here line(i * 20, 0, i * 20, height) background(0)

root.description: A colon declares the start of an indented block. Any statement followed by an indendent block of code should end with a colon.
